title: Rococo Orianna

embed.description: League of Legends Fan Art - Orianna skin.

body:
Rococo Orianna please. It had MAJOR backing on the old threads. There were 7 riot posts, one of which talked about showing it to the skins team and then.....nothing. This is such a good Orianna concept I'm not sure why it is being ignored.

This is the thread for the original post:

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2673124

Orianna Approved {{champion:61}}

replies.body: This is a pretty neat idea! I'd be curious to see what her skills would look like. :3

They could be inspired by gold-filigree type outlook. 

Simple, yet elegant and lacy, but not so lacy that it would distract. (Victorian inspired, but not as complex).
She could have her skills mostly unchanged, so we can finally have a lower-priced skin again. That was supposed to be a thing.

OMG you actually looked this!
Now you're my personal favorite rioter <3

IMO the only skill that need some extra particles would be the Command: protect (E), which can have something like the Lulu's shield but with the rococo theme.

I always thought that {{champion:61}}  Orianna was a princess, or a *doncella* and this skin fits that idea perfectly!

Sorry for my bad English, I'm just so excited, this have chances of happening? :p
I clearly have to agree with her because i really love {{champion:61}} and she's one the best champs I've used ever since she came out.
make halloween thresh skin 8)
Amazing :3 I have no idea how I can upvote you on the new boards though
You see the number at the top of this post? It's currently at 5. There are arrows above and below that number. Clicking on the arrow below downvotes, while the arrow above the number does upvote.
Well it's a gorgeous skin splash art that's for sure.
I'd love this, especially if it were part of a Visual Kei line, maybe there could also be a Pink Spider/hide Elise and a Princess/Hizaki Ezreal.
This is straight out of weeb vill but i want it. idc.
It is actually from the Rococo style hence..oh I don't know..rococo? -_- Not japanese at all.

> This is straight out of weeb vill but i want it. idc.

How so?  It isn't Japanese that I can tell.  Strikes me as closer to Victorian.

I support this skin.

I LOVE IT!

I wish some rioter could give this a comment u.u

I mean, only a few skins come out in every patch, and there are over 115 champs...

It could happen but it might take forever.
It has been around for a year, maybe even two. It isn't a new concept. I just added it to the beta forums for more attention.

Usual Champion Skins take about 4-6 weeks, and only if the design team fully-fleshed out the concept on paper before they work on it.   
Legendary ones take couple of months, while Ultimate can take about a year or even more.

Special cases like Kha'Zix or Zyra, who have complex appearances - the work on their skins is almost as creating a new Champion. They have too many effects and stuff to design. Zyra with her seeds and plants, Ultimate, her passive turret and Kha with and without evolutional parts, W, Q, E, R.. and so on.

As I buy skins for the splash art. I have yet to buy my Ori a skin. This skin would change that.
{{champion:61}}

I like the splash art, gorgeous really. Some cool custom particles and it'll will another skin I can't afford.
Poverty aside, really cool.
Makes me wish I was a robot.
wow. just wow
Riot.
I don't play her, but i really like the skin. Very pretty.
I am happy with winter wonderland but I still want this!
needs more reds
More attention
More attention
Bump
i love  it, I don't play her, but this would make me want to.
This is so perfect please make this happen!!

Link to original thread in the forum archives

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2673124

When I first saw this concept in 2012 I instantly supported it. 

I had been bumping it periodically and was happy to see that it had four posts by Riot members. It had 1,929 upvotes; I really hope that Riot can make this skin happen!
That skin is so beautiful. It would be perfect for it to come out during the spring time. :)
This looks great, the splash doesn't even need to be changed.
I think this is an amazing skin for her! I would totally wear this while playing as her!
I would buy this.
Arcade Fire in my head now...
awesome skin
Riot please! We are asking you to give us a chance to give you our money!

The only thing I ask is if Riot makes this skin, please don't butcher how creative and colorful it is. I love every part of the design. The artist does not mind at all having this concept as a skin. If you go to deviantart, on the 4th page, the artist consents. 

LamierFang Oct 25, 2012  Hobbyist Digital Artist
Suggesting already. Hoping Riot will adopt! ;)

I really like that skin

if they make I am buying {{champion:61}} for just the skin. I am not even good at mages
It must have a faberge egg somewhere. The E shield, or the ball. Make it so. Make her W a tea dish too.
{{champion:61}} Orianna Hype{{champion:61}}  Riot let's see it, I would buy it :D

Personally, I see her more as a Marionette or a Mannequin like you would see in 'SAW'
Jigsaw-like
It's not a good skin concept until it hits the best page twice!
She NEEDS a skin with new spell effects PLZ {{champion:61}} {{item:3070}}
ive seen this pic a while back, thought it was actually a skin but it wasnt lol
This looks so cute
